column4: Ok, quick question.  I'm trying to switch to ubuntu from windows for the first time.  Every time I try to "check disk for errors" or "intall or start ubuntu", my monitor loses signal and nothing is displayed.  I'm using an 8800gt with two dvi ports.  Any ideas how to get this installed?
While I see nothing I can hear the CD spinning for a few minutes on error check
get the alternate text install cd, your card needs drivers that aren't on the live cd
